channel.title: Need Help Setting Up Vote?
channel.description: All Good Servers Have Voting How Do i Get it on mines? Thanks, Mikey.

item.title: Need Help Setting Up Vote?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

First, you need to do the website part. Once a player has voted, it would send the playerâ€™s name to a mysql table, along with it saying he/she did vote.
Then you need to make your server request said data from the mysql table used before. And once the item(s) have been retrieved, it would delete the users data from the table, or add an int saying he/she has claimed his reward and cannot claim it again for X hours.

Read full topic
